content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Can you please let me know your name to get started?
This is Tom. My AC is making a horrible noise and not cooling. How much is this going to cost me?

Thank you, Tom! Sorry to hear about your AC. I can help get a technician out to take a look. Pricing depends on the specific issue, but I can provide an estimate or set up an in-person diagnostic if you prefer. May I have your address to get started?
Great, thank you. Let me check that you are within our service area so we can continue.

You’re in our service area! For AC issues, a diagnostic visit is typically needed. The visit fee is $69, which goes toward any repair if you decide to proceed. Would you like to schedule an appointment? If so, what time works best for you?
Is there an extra charge if this is after 5pm? It's got to be late today or tomorrow morning. I can't take off work.

I understand, Tom. There’s no additional charge for evening appointments during our standard service hours, which run until 7pm. I’ll check the next available slots for this evening and tomorrow morning. Does 6pm today or 8am tomorrow work for you?
6pm today would be perfect. Get me on the list.

You’re all set for today at 6pm. Our technician will arrive at 182 Oakridge Drive, Springfield to diagnose your AC issue. You’ll receive a reminder closer to your appointment. If you have any other questions or need to reschedule, just reply here!
